title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.52 - Parked aircraft to have running lights on between sunset and sunrise; exception
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.52 - Parked aircraft to have running lights on between sunset and sunrise; exception

State Regulations

Every aircraft parked on a public ramp or apron area, public passenger ramp or apron area, or public cargo ramp and apron area shall
have its running lights lighted during the hours between sunet and sunrise
except in areas designated by the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
